articles.title: Bopanna makes Australian Open men's doubles final after first win as world No. 1 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The second seed beat Zhizhen and Machac 6-3, 3-6, 7-6 (10-7) in the semifinal as Bopanna and Ebden reached their second consecutive Grand Slam final together. | Tennis News
articles.content: A day after Rohan Bopanna was assured of the world No. 1 ranking come Monday, making him the oldest man to take the crown for the first time in his career, the Indian tennis ace notched up a sensatio… [+3764 chars]

articles.title: Four Indians Drown At Philip Island Beach In Australia's Victoria - NDTV
articles.description: Four Indians drowned off an unpatrolled beach at Phillip Island in Australia's Victoria on Wednesday. The victims - a man and two women in their 20s and another woman in her 40s - belonged to an extended family, local media reported.
articles.content:
Three of them had died at the scene while the fourth victim died in hospital. (Representational)

articles.author: Liz Kruesi
articles.title: The lost continent of Zealandia has been mapped for the first time - National Geographic
articles.description: This enormous chunk of submerged continental crust sits between Antarctica and Australia, where it connected the landmasses as part of a supercontinent some 300 million years ago.
articles.content: After years of exploration and research, scientists have finished mapping a sunken continent that lurks beneath the South Pacific. This chunk of continental crust, driven to the depths millions of ye… [+6660 chars]
